preamble: A N  A Ct   To   Amend   The  C Ompanies  A Ct , N O . 07  Of  2007
Be It Enacted By The Parliament Of The Democratic Socialist Republic Of Sri Lanka As Follows:-

pre_section_list.text: This Act may be cited as the Companies (Amendment) Act, No. 13 of 2019.
pre_block_list: Amendment of section 5 of Act, No. 07 of 2007.

pre_section_list.text: Section 5 of the Companies Act, No. 07 of 2007 (hereinafter referred to as the principal enactment) is hereby amended in subsection (1) by the repeal of paragraphs ( b ) and ( c ) thereof and the substitution therefor, of the following:-

child_level_list.text: assign a unique number to that company as its company number;
issue a certificate of incorporation in the prescribed form to the applicant company; and

notify the general public, within sixty working days of  the incorporation of a company, by a notice published in a daily newspaper which has circulation in Sinhala, English and Tamil languages which shall specify
the address of the registered office of the company

pre_section_list.text: Section 9 of the principal enactment is hereby amended as follows:-
pre_block_list: Amendment of section 9 of the principal enactment.

child_level_list.text: by the repeal of subsection (1) thereof; and
in subsection (3) thereof, by the substitution for the words subsection (1) or (2) of the words, subsection (2).

pre_section_list.text: Section 10 of the principal enactment  is hereby amended by the repeal of paragraph ( b ) of subsection (1) thereof, and the substitution therefor, of the following paragraph:-
pre_block_list: Amendment of section 10 of the principal enactment.

child_level_list.text: a request is made to the Registrar to do so within three months of public notice of the name being given under section 5 (1) ( d ) and section 9 (2) by another company or by a registered overseas company, where
the name of the first mentioned company is so similar to the name of the requesting company that it is likely to cause confusion; and
the requesting company was registered with its current name before the first mentioned company was registered with the name objected to; or.

pre_section_list.text: In the event of any inconsistency between the Sinhala and Tamil texts of this Act, the Sinhala text shall prevail.
pre_block_list: Sinhala text to prevail in case of inconsistency.
